itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, September 9, 2013
description: Investors have been shifting away from emerging markets, but where are they going instead? The answer may be Europe. Americans are retiring later and later in life and now there's a new industry growing that of helps people find more rewarding jobs as they age. And an accomplished late night TV host is coming back--Arsenio Hall. Will he be a hit in the right demographic?
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, September 9, 2013
byline: Queena Kim, Rowan Moore Gerety, Amy Scott, Chris Farrell, Sam Beard, Bruce Johnson, Mark Garrison, Chester Wisniewski and David Brancaccio
teaser: Investors have been shifting away from emerging markets, but where are they going instead? The answer may be Europe. Americans are retiring later and later in life and now there's a new industry growing that of helps people find more rewarding jobs as they age. And an accomplished late night TV host is coming back--Arsenio Hall. Will he be a hit in the right demographic?
